M

main - package main
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class main.GameEnvironment
Entry point for the game.
MainWindow - Class in gui
this class handles the displaying of the state of the game, and user input.
MainWindow(GameEnvironment) - Constructor for class gui.MainWindow
Create the application window and set elements to the correct initial values.
mainWindow() - Method in class main.GameEnvironment
Launches main gui window.
MAX_CREW - Static variable in class main.GameSetup
 
MAX_DAYS - Static variable in class main.GameSetup
 
Medic - Class in crew
the CrewMember subclass Medic adds a PlagueCure item to a CrewState's inventory at the start of the game.
Medic(String) - Constructor for class crew.Medic
creates a Medic with the given name.
MIN_CREW - Static variable in class main.GameSetup
 
MIN_DAYS - Static variable in class main.GameSetup
 
MoneyFindEvent - Class in eventmanager
MoneyFindEvent gives a random amount of money to the crew.
MoneyFindEvent() - Constructor for class eventmanager.MoneyFindEvent
 
moveForwardADay() - Method in class main.GameEnvironment
Increases daysPassed and activates DAY_START events.
